content: Dear users, with the arrival of the blockchain bull market, many currencies are experiencing astonishing gains. In order to enable TrueDEX users to enjoy the high returns brought by the bull market, TrueDEX will continue to introduce high growth value currencies. TrueDEX has now been listed in three trading currencies: KPEPE/USDT (K PEPE is 1000PEPE)、DOT/USDT、APT/USDT. Welcome everyone to truedex.io for trading!

Dear user, with the arrival of the blockchain bull market, counterfeit coins have also begun to see good growth. SHIB broke through 0.00045 today, with a 24-hour increase of over 90%. TrueDEX has now been launched on SHIB/USDT, welcome everyone to truedex.io for trading!

Dear user, the EAC/USDT trading pair has now been officially listed on the TrueDEX exchange. The Earth Coin EAC is a pure PoW coin born in Canada on December 20, 2013, with a total amount of 13.5 billion yuan. Its vision is to be green, environmentally friendly, and public welfare, making every labor on Earth valuable. Welcome everyone to truedex.io for trading!
